definition: (lit.) to lie stiff like a corpse/(coll.) to sleep
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns

sentences.english: Usually Savasana is performed with the legs turned out.
sentences.chinese: 通常做挺屍式是兩腿向外轉。
